title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Archive
body: Archive          Past Issues of General Management Planning Newsletter Spring 2009      Virtual Open House: May 2009 Welcome to the first series of meetings on the African Burial Ground National Monument's General Management Planning process. Letter from the Superintendent, Tara D. Morrison Information on the new Visitor Center planned to open early 2010 (floor plan) Five Important Facts about the National Monument The National Park Service General Management Planning process Please share your ideas and comments with us.
